ygData.subject: Re: Zimel's Blades
ygData.msgSnippet: This is what I don t get, the game is being tweaked to counter powergamer abuses etc.. I thought this was a RPG and the roleplayers shouldn t have to suffer
ygData.messageBody:
This is what I don't get, the game is being tweaked to counter
powergamer abuses etc.. I thought this was a RPG and the roleplayers
shouldn't have to suffer from what the powergamers do.. And I thought
the hard part about this weapon was the quest part, not the battles..
I am saying, Verant shouldn't balance the game as if everyone is
twinking and using shortcuts and spoilers to quests, they can NOT
do this because it will ruin the experience for the really devoted
players who play fair. It would be like making quake and taking into
account the cheatcodes when setting how hard the monsters are..

- Avron Elselynn - Solusek Ro



"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> Sir Lucan is now a 7 hour spawn. I have not been to mistmoore yet, but i
> heard the SK is also a 7 hour spawn and the hilt is now no drop.
>
> Shada
